HDG.LOG.content: en as Zeus [as legein?] [?] > [Zeus: highest present being—not Being???] > to name, to call forward, that which is laid down/gathered in name comes to light [Zeus as the dispatcher, lightning bolt as sending, of gathering]

HDG.ID.content: essence of identity is property of Ereignis > a departure from Being as ground of beings that springs into abyss, but not empty nothingness, this abyss is Ereignis > principle of identity means a spring required by essence of identity to attain essential light of Ereignis > Ereignis vibrates active nature of what speaks as language, once called House of Being [dissemination?]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.IWM.content: metaphysics thinks/represents beings as (only) beings, owes this sight to the light of Being > this light itself, what metaphysics sees as light, no longer w/in range of metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: metaphysics thinks/represents beings as (only) beings, owes this sight to the light of Being > this light itself, what metaphysics sees as light, no longer w/in range of metaphysics

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.FS.content: kosmos is fire (pyr): (threefold sense) rising flame (aufsteigende Flamme), brooding glow (brütende Glut), radiating light (strahlendes Licht) > for Heraclitus (unlike modern man who reduces word to one meaning), this manifold richness is kosmos, never isolated, shimmers ungraspably through everything
HDG.FS.linkedContent: kosmos is fire (pyr): (threefold sense) rising flame (aufsteigende Flamme), brooding glow (brütende Glut), radiating light (strahlendes Licht) > for Heraclitus (unlike modern man who reduces word to one meaning), this manifold richness is kosmos, never isolated, shimmers ungraspably through everything

HDG.FS.content: what is the Same in which day passes to night? the en, the unity, other name for Being? world, light, space, time, etc.—all too general (allgemeinen)

HDG.LP.content: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.LP.linkedContent: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature

HDG.OHF.content: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
